title: Any OPL players on these boards?
body: Just curious to see if any of them make appearences

replies.body: Nah man none of us around here

> [{quoted}](name=LGC Carbon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v1B4RI0E,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-04T05:35:06.205+0000)
>
> Nah man none of us around here

Carbon, exists in the boards and yuzuki, wow 2 of too many, oh well, drop a branch on em
LOL i haven't check boards in forever, yuzuki <3, you OPL guys are awesome, much love to you and your team, as well as the others :)

You're more likely to find them in some of the public in-client chat channels. I haven't joined them for a while (so can't remember the names) but last time I checked a few of the popular OCE channels that were on NA server (before we got OCE server) moved over to OCE and remained active. Do a bit of Googling, you'll find it.
